name: last lord of the edge
description:
fullscreen recommended ⮥

left click: slice approaching enemies (uses stamina)

mouse move: move shield to block arrows

stamina's indicated by your aura - if you run out you have to wait for it to fully recover. gain as many points as possible by defying death though sword kills and arrow blocks.

The last knight of your kingdom, pursued by the invading forces bent on extinguishing all remnants of the resistance to the edge of the known world. Beaten down, exhausted, and with nowhere else to run you are faced with your last stand at the cliffs at the endless ocean. Defy death as long as you can, but your fate has already been sealed.
